mapper.select: SELECT M.MAJOR_NO, M.COURSE_NO, M.MAJOR_NAME, M.TRACK_CODE, M.GRADE, P.PROF_NAME FROM TBL_MAJOR M, TBL_USER_MAJOR UM, TBL_PROFESSOR P WHERE UM.MAJOR_NO = M.MAJOR_NO AND M.PROF_NO = P.PROF_NO AND UM.USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY M.MAJOR_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_USER_MAJOR (USER_MAJOR_NO, USER_NO, MAJOR_NO) VALUES (SEQ_USER_MAJOR.NEXTVAL, #{userNo}, #{majorNo})
mapper.select: SELECT M.MAJOR_NO, M.COURSE_NO, M.MAJOR_NAME, M.TRACK_CODE, M.GRADE, P.PROF_NAME FROM TBL_MAJOR M, TBL_PROFESSOR P WHERE M.MAJOR_NO NOT IN(SELECT UM.MAJOR_NO FROM TBL_USER_MAJOR UM where UM.USER_NO = #{userNo}) AND M.PROF_NO = P.PROF_NO AND M.MAJOR_NO >= 0 ORDER BY M.MAJOR_NO DESC
